cards.name: Abimanyu
cards.description: Enthusiast of everything AI, machine learning, and data science.
cards.fun_fact: Did you know that slime molds can solve complex problems even without a brain?

cards.name: Arnav Ravinder
cards.description: A tech geek, who loves exploring new technologies and aims to leverage technology to solve real-world problems.
cards.fun_fact: Slime molds can remember and anticipate events!

cards.name: Shashank
cards.description: Inquisitive and creative coder who is interested in blockchain and open source.
cards.catchphrase: The code is mightier than the sword!
cards.fun_fact: Slime molds can grow and cover large distances in search of food!

cards.name: Hrithik Yash
cards.description: Innovative and tech-savvy, with a strong interest in cars and technology.
cards.catchphrase: Driven by curiosity, fueled by innovation!
cards.fun_fact: Slime molds can live and thrive in various environments, from forests to your own backyard!

cards.name: Sruthi
cards.description: Passionate about coding, music, and data science.
cards.fun_fact: Did you know that slime molds can solve mazes?

cards.name: Arnav
cards.description: Young and dedicated coder, ready to take on challenges.
cards.fun_fact: Slime molds can replicate colors of light they're exposed to!
